com.warzone.strategy.PlayerStrategy

Packages that use PlayerStrategy
Package
Description
com.warzone.elements
Contains basic elements used in the game like countries, continents, map and player.
com.warzone.strategy
Contains four types of strategy of player: Random, Cheater Aggressive, Benevolent and Human.

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Aggressive
    Aggressive class implementing PlayerStrategy that focuses on centralization of forces and then attack, i.e.
    class 
    Benevolent
    Benevolent class which is used to protect its weak countries.
    class 
    Cheater
    Class to implement the Cheater Player
    class 
    HumanPlayer
    Human player class that that deploys, attacks, moves armies according to his requirement.
    class 
    RandomPlayer
    Random player class that attacks random neighboring countries, deploys on a random country, and moves armies randomly between its countries.
